message: ...The next morning, I wake up feeling refreshed for a change.
A proper night's sleep in a real bed did wonders. My headache is almost entirely gone.
I get out of bed and leave the room, heading for the den.
At the bar counter, I find some instant coffee and pull a pair of mugs from the cabinet.
I figure I'll bring Noiz some coffee too. That way, I can apologize for what happened yesterday.
While preparing the coffee, I hear a door open.
...Noiz steps into the den.
Suddenly nervous, I stare intently at the hot water pouring into the cups.
He walks up to me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Morning."

name: ノイズ
message: "Morning."
...He answered. I'm a little relieved.
Noiz sits on the couch while I finish with the coffee.
When it's done, I set a mug in front of him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I made coffee."

name: ノイズ
message: "Thanks."
A surprisingly normal response.

...Phew. He doesn't seem mad. At least, not right now.

As Noiz brings the cup to his lips, I decide it's time.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...So, um, about yesterday..."

name: ノイズ
message: "Ngh!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?!"
Suddenly, Noiz jerks his head back, pressing his hand against his mouth.
Did he burn himself?
I run to the bar counter, fill a cup with water, and grab a box of tissues.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sorry, was it too hot? Here, have some water."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I didn't know you were that sensitive. You okay?"

name: ノイズ
message: "...It's no big deal."
I wipe at the coffee dribbling down Noiz's hand. It's soaked, yet he still has a firm grip on the mug.
How can he hold the cup like that if it was hot enough to burn his tongue?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! Go run some water over your hand! It's probably burned."

name: ノイズ
message: "My hand? ...Oh."
Noiz looks at his hand like he only just noticed.
His skin is already red and swollen. It hurts just looking at it.
I think about dragging him to the sink, but then I remember how he reacted yesterday.
Maybe I shouldn't be too forceful...
